"Scary Martin"
A characteristic building. +5 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, +2 [ICON_Science] technology value, +2 [ICON_Amenities] amenity, +5 [ICON_Production] productivity, +2 [ICON_GreatMerchant] points.
"Blemish light"
"Master Xuan Tie"
knight arena
A characteristic building. Gain a trade route upon completion. +10[ICON_Gold] coins, +2[ICON_Culture] culture, +2[ICON_Amenities] amenity
"Four Cities United"
Characteristic city center buildings. +2[ICON_Gold] gold coins, +2[ICON_Food] food, +1[ICON_Amenities] amenity, +5[ICON_Housing] housing
Chamber of Commerce
A characteristic area. Alternative to the Commercial Center, cheaper to build. Has a higher adjacency bonus. +2[ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant Points
Not afraid of the dark
"Fearless of Bitter Darkness" plus 1 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength

rhode island
Knight of Sword and Shield
The Land of Neons and Knights

Add 1[ICON_Production] productivity, 1[ICON_Culture] culture, 1[ICON_Gold] gold coin and 1[ICON_Food] food to all cells in the territory. Each [ICON_Citizen] citizen produces 2 [ICON_Production] productivity and 2 [ICON_Science] technology. Gain an additional economic policy slot. City [ICON_Gold] gold coin output increased by 20%

All military units plus 12 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. For each land military unit except support units, all military units will have 1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. After killing the enemy, get [ICON_Gold] gold coins equivalent to 100% of the enemy's combat power
A heavy cavalry unit in ancient times, with amazing power. It has a lower cost and higher [ICON_Strength] combat effectiveness than heavy tanks

Information age siege units that can be produced and maintained without strategic resources. Has a high [ICON_Strength] combat power when bombing. Has a wider [ICON_range] range and faster [ICON_Movement] movement than rocket launchers
Knight of Sword and Shield

All military units plus 12 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. For each land military unit except support units, all military units will have 1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. After killing the enemy, get [ICON_Gold] gold coins equivalent to 100% of the enemy's combat power

Add 1[ICON_Production] productivity, 1[ICON_Culture] culture, 1[ICON_Gold] gold coin and 1[ICON_Food] food to all cells in the territory. Each [ICON_Citizen] citizen produces 2 [ICON_Production] productivity and 2 [ICON_Science] technology. Gain an additional economic policy slot. City [ICON_Gold] gold coin output increased by 20%
Glory about to mature
Hates civilizations that wage war against city-states or civilizations (on the same continent as their capital)
repent! (Maria hates you attacking other civilizations on her continent)
Although I don't have too much confidence in my swordsmanship and Originium skills... But if you have any questions about equipment maintenance, please feel free to ask me!
Sorry, but I can't accept your friendship just yet.
Do you want to be friends with me?
Hey, in fact, I was addicted to knight novels for a while before, knights, enemies, adventures, and wealth. But these could have been obtained in the knight competition, so they fell.
Well, it's a pity that I can't be friends with you.
I will never back down!
In order to continue to defend the glory of the Linguang family, I have no choice but to declare war on you.
Wow, thank you so much for the gift!
Sorry, but I cannot accept these gifts.
Actually, I'm better at craftsman than knight! Whether it's fixing an alarm clock or forging armor, I can help!
I'm not easy to bully!
Hope you don't take it too far! (condemns you)
Knight Casimir, code-named "Xianguang", you can just call me Maria, right?
Do you want to come and see us?
Well, that would be great.
This is the interior of Rhodes Island. I really want to see what the structure map looks like.
You have such a good character, I think you will definitely make a lot of friends.
Hope you don't hurt us.
I don't know if you want to be an ally with me?
We don't mean any harm, I wonder if you can move your army?
And...it's not over yet!
Glad you agree to my deal.
That's a pity, but I don't want to trade with you at the moment.
